comments:
After installing emft-transaction-SDK-I200605250954 the "Help->About Eclipse SDK" menu doesnt show the "about dialog box". Errors are produced in the error. I was able to reproduce the issue with te following "minimal" configuration:

eclipse-SDK-3.2RC5-linux-gtk
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-I200605250000
uml2-SDK-2.0RC4
emft-ocl-SDK-I200605250918
emft-validation-SDK-I200605250944
emft-transaction-SDK-I200605250954

Using Sun JDK build 1.5.0_06-b05.
Reproduced with a new empty workspace dir too.

The problem does not exist when emft-transaction-SDK is not installed (and when the other plugins are the same as in the list above).

Steps to reproduce.
1) install the eclipse platform and plugins from the list above
2) Start Eclipse: eclipse -clean -data $WORKSPACE_TEST_DIR
3) Go to Help->About...
4) Look at the error log

The Error Log follows:

The image files for the transaction plugin were stored in CVS as ASCII files. They were getting corrupted whenever they were transferred to an OS other than windows. Our build system runs on Linux. The files have been propertly tagged as binary files and the scenario has been tested as described in this bug with a test spin of our build system. This bug has completely disappeared with the fix.
